question: Which team has been crowned 2019 Vijay Hazare Trophy champions?
explanation: Karnataka has been crowned the 2019-20 Vijay Hazare Champions as they beat Tamil Nadu by 9 wickets in the Vijay Hazare Trophy at Bengaluru via VJD method. Its their fourth Vijay Hazare Trophy title. As per VJD method, Karnataka should have been 86/1 in 23 overs. Karnataka were well ahead with 146/1, 23 overs. Mayank Agarwal 69 and K L Rahul 52 not out and Abhimanyu Mithun 5/34 starred for Karnataka in the final in Bengaluru. The final was called off due to persistent rains.
